total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the pattern of the color change in the examples. In this case, 8 changes to 4, 1, 2, and 3.
Q2: Identify the areas in the input grid of the quiz where the color 8 is present.

Q3: Determine the rules for when 8 changes to 4, 1, 2, or 3. From the examples, it seems that 8 changes to 4 when it is in the top left corner, to 1 when it is in the top right corner, to 2 when it is in the bottom right corner, and to 3 when it is in the bottom left corner.
Q4: Apply these rules to the areas identified in Q2 in the input grid of the quiz.
Q1: Identify the areas in the grid that are filled with 8s.
Q2: Determine the shape of each area filled with 8s.
Q3: Assign a unique color to each different shape.
Q4: Replace the 8s in each shape with the corresponding unique color.
